quotes.quote: Education is the most powerful weapon which you can use to change the world.
quotes.author: Nelson Mandela

quotes.quote: Beauty is power; a smile is its sword.
quotes.author: John Ray

quotes.quote: Most schools have only a microwave or deep fryer, hardly the tools needed to feed our children real, fresh food.
quotes.author: Mark Hyman

quotes.quote: Fanatics do not have faith - they have belief. With faith you let go. You trust. Whereas with belief you cling.
quotes.author: Yann Martel

quotes.quote: War is sweet to those who haven't experienced it.
quotes.author: Latin saying

quotes.quote: Two things are infinite: the universe and human stupidity; and I'm not sure about the universe.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: Some people never go crazy. What truly horrible lives they must lead.
quotes.author: Charles Bukowski

quotes.quote: Be yourself; everyone else is already taken.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: The gods conceal from men the happiness of death, that they may endure life.
quotes.author: Lucan

quotes.quote: We first fought the heathens in the name of religion, then Communism, and now in the name of drugs and terrorism. Our excuses for global domination always change.
quotes.author: Serj Tankian

quotes.quote: The theory of undirected evolution is already dead, but the work of science continues.
quotes.author: Michael Behe

quotes.quote: Resolution One: I will live for God. Resolution Two: If no one else does, I still will.
quotes.author: Jonathan Edwards

quotes.quote: I am thankful for laughter, except when milk comes out of my nose.
quotes.author: Woody Allen

quotes.quote: Never mind what others do do better than yourself, beat your own record from day to day, and you are a success.
quotes.author: William J. H. Boetcker

quotes.quote: As long as acquiring knowledge is the educational goal of schools, educational opportunities will be limited, as they are now, to affluent families.
quotes.author: William Glasser

quotes.quote: Skiing combines outdoor fun with knocking down trees with your face.
quotes.author: Dave Barry

quotes.quote: No man is an island. No man stands alone.
quotes.author: Dennis Brown

quotes.quote: Love is composed of a single soul inhabiting two bodies.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.quote: Everything has beauty, but not everyone sees it.
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.quote: Most schools have only a microwave or deep fryer, hardly the tools needed to feed our children real, fresh food.
quotes.author: Mark Hyman

quotes.quote: The definition of a modern approach to war is the acknowledgement of individual lives lost.
quotes.author: Maya Lin

quotes.quote: A lot of truth is said in jest.
quotes.author: Eminem

quotes.quote: Assassination has never changed the history of the world.
quotes.author: Benjamin Disraeli

quotes.quote: Dictators and oppressors should continue to fear me because I will be here for a long time.
quotes.author: Lech Walesa

quotes.quote: He who has great power should use it lightly.
quotes.author: Lucius Annaeus Seneca

quotes.quote: It's not fair that women look in the mirror and feel disgust because of what society has made them believe.
quotes.author: Jessica Simpson

quotes.quote: It is better to fail in originality than to succeed in imitation.
quotes.author: Herman Melville

quotes.quote: I'm not afraid of death; I just don't want to be there when it happens.
quotes.author: Woody Allen

quotes.quote: In politics, stupidity is not a handicap.
quotes.author: Napol√©on Bonaparte
